segment.source: DISM in Windows 10 supports new features:
segment.target: DISM in Windows 10 supports new features:

segment.source: Windows Imaging and Configuration Designer and related tools.
segment.target: Windows Imaging and Configuration Designer and related tools.

segment.source: Full Flash Update (.FFU): DISM supports the Full Flash Update (.FFU) format, which captures an applies an entire drive, including partition information.
segment.target: Full Flash Update (.FFU): DISM supports the Full Flash Update (.FFU) format, which captures an applies an entire drive, including partition information.

segment.source: This can make deployment faster and easier.
segment.target: This can make deployment faster and easier.

segment.source: To learn more, see WIM vs FFU image file formats and /Apply-FFU and /Split-FFU in DISM Image Management Command-Line Options.
segment.target: To learn more, see WIM vs FFU image file formats and /Apply-FFU and /Split-FFU in DISM Image Management Command-Line Options.

segment.source: Capabilities: This new Windows package type allows you to request services like .NET or languages without specifying the version.
segment.target: Capabilities: This new Windows package type allows you to request services like .NET or languages without specifying the version.

segment.source: Use DISM to search multiple sources like Windows Update or your corporate servers to find and install the latest version.
segment.target: Use DISM to search multiple sources like Windows Update or your corporate servers to find and install the latest version.

segment.source: For more info, see DISM Capabilities Package Servicing Command-Line Options.
segment.target: For more info, see DISM Capabilities Package Servicing Command-Line Options.

segment.source: To learn more, see the new topic: DISM Capabilities Package Servicing Command-Line Options.
segment.target: To learn more, see the new topic: DISM Capabilities Package Servicing Command-Line Options.

segment.source: Compress operating system and provisioning packages: Save space on a Windows image by running the operating system and other system files from compressed files.
segment.target: Compress operating system and provisioning packages: Save space on a Windows image by running the operating system and other system files from compressed files.

segment.source: This replaces the WIMBoot features from Windows 8.1.
segment.target: This replaces the WIMBoot features from Windows 8.1.

segment.source: To learn more, see /Apply-Image/Compact and /Apply-CustomDataImage in DISM Image Management Command-Line Options.
segment.target: To learn more, see /Apply-Image/Compact and /Apply-CustomDataImage in DISM Image Management Command-Line Options.

segment.source: For an overview of DISM, see What is DISM?.
segment.target: For an overview of DISM, see What is DISM?.
